value.title: Review: AiRROBO PC100 Pool Cleaning Robot

value.title: Robotics: New skin-like sensors fit almost everywhere
value.excerpt: Researchers have developed an automatic process for making soft sensors. These universal measurement cells can be attached to almost any kind of object. Applications are envisioned especially in robotics and prosthetics.

value.title: Exploring how soft robotics can revolutionize minimally invasive surgery
